website_summaries.verdict: Brightly colored nap mat featuring Minnie Mouse character will be fun for children. Features a mat, blanket, and pillow all in one.
pros: Lightweight nap mat that provides a comfortable sleeping surface
Includes a sleeping mat, blanket, and pillow all in one design
You can roll up the mat tightly and close it with Velcro straps to make it easy to transport with the convenient carrying handle
cons: Smaller than most nap mats, so may not work well for kids beyond preschool age

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1-2 year olds.  Definitely NOT preschool size.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars if it was bigger but it's TINY. To be fair to Amazon, it does say "toddler" on it but it came up in a "preschool nap mat" search so I bought it for my 4 year old. He is a tiny 35lbs, smaller than most preschoolers but he is about 6-8" too tall for this. My suggestion would be that it is fabulous for a 1-2 year old but any older and they will be much too tall.
customer_reviews.author: pepperTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare.
customer_reviews.text: First my daughter totally loves it! I bought for her nap time at daycare. The pillow is soft and fluffy. The blanket is the perfect size and warm. The fabric is fleece so it’s suler soft. The mat is not designed to use over a hard surface. It’s basically another blanket with different fabric (nylon) It’s super easy to roll and pack. The colors are brilliant after 2 washes It’s perfect if you are going to use it over carpet, pad or foamy surface. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Yury merchan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and fun. The
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this little nap matt. The pillow is comfortable and large enough for her to roll around on a little bit. Rolls up into a compact little package that she likes to carry around. The blanket is pretty soft and its over ther. The matt is a little thin but when its on carpet it feels fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. We can’t go anywhere with out it. Probably my Best Buy ever for her
customer_reviews.author: Robert Czajkowski

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the prefect nap mat for my kiddo! She’ll be going to preschool in November when she turns 3. She LOVES this mat. There isn’t a whole lot of cushion on the bottom but it’ll be good for over the preschool’s nap mats. The top part is fleece and is super soft. The pillow is perfect. Haven’t washed it yet, but seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Minnie nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves her Minnie Mouse nap mat. Easy to use, rolls back up nicely. The blanket does hang out a bit further than the bottom when folding but I assume that's just so there's enough blanket to cover child when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hargon

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it feel to pieces!
customer_reviews.text: First time I washed this, it exploded in my washing machine! But up until then I had loved it and thought it was a great piece... My daughter absolutely loved it; the texture of the attached blanket was very plush; and it was the perfect size for my preschooler for nap time. However, it ultimately fell to pieces during it's first wash so that changed my perception of the quality. I will say that I was very happy with how quickly I was able to exchange the defective product. The new piece was in my hands by the next day. But the ultimate test will be whether this new one holds up so stay tuned for an update
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Deleston

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great idea, but....
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 2 year old who tries to cover her face with everything, This won’t work, either. The product is amazing....soft, cozy, cute attached pillow, rolls up nicely and closes with Velcro. Bought this figuring with granddaughter’s weight holding down the bottom, she wouldn’t be able to pull the blanket over her face. She instead, immediately, did a 360 degree roll and had the pillow and bottom portion over her face. It got rolled up and now we just use it when she’s playing on the front room floor in full view of an adult. It’s a great price and worth it, if your child is not one who decides everything she finds goes over the face.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for her daycare cot. It's actually a little smaller than the cots they have. I am not sure if there is a standard cot size. You can buy these nap rolls directly from daycare but I thought purchasing a Minnie Mouse one since she loves Minnie would be more of a comfort for her. This is great because its machine washable, and rolls up easy for storage. I recommend this product just check the dimensions if you are using it for a specific size cot!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great but how do I wash it?
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and the fact that it looks and functions exactly as pictured. I bought it because my 2 yr old kept catching impetigo and doc wanted to rule out his school so we lay this across his cot at nap time. I dont like the fact that its 1 piece so when washing in the washer the pillow stuffing get all mushed around and its not as tight as it was. I imagine if I continue to wash it in the washer eventually the pillow will cone off. What other way can you wash this? Als its very soft and cozy. My 2 yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ceo

customer_reviews.title: Minnie is cute, but she needs a little padding and quality!
customer_reviews.text: If your kid loves Minnie, this is already a win. It's cute and functional. I took a star off because the blanket part is very thin, more like cheaper terrycloth, and the padding, like most others, is on the thin side. That said, it was on sale for a great price and got smiles simply because it was Minnie Mouse and functional as a nap mat. My advice? Feed Minnie! Get some padding on her and go a bit higher end on the fabric for the blanket to give it more weight or soft/minky feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping mat!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son needed a sleeping bag for daycare so I got him this instead. It works perfectly. I didn't care about the design at all, not sure if it matches the picture but It has Lightning on it so whatever. Daycare said he sleeps just fine on it and it's perfect for them. We've washed it a handful of times and has held up just fine. Love the fact it rolls up making it easy to take places
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son who is in Pre-K 2. Obviously they have naptime (I wish I did too lol) and I was looking for a new blanket for him and forget it...when I saw this, it's just so practical! I got it dirt cheap as an "add on item" and it's so worth it! It's easy to clean, quick to dry (I don't put it in the dryer), & it rolls up kinda like a little petite sleeping bag with a little handle to carry. SO FAR the attached pillow (that doesn't detach btw) hasn't become discombobulated yet so it's held up great considering I take it home every Friday to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Marie

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: This is just what i needed for my son to bring to pre-k. This a is a great size for him. he fits in 4t clothes. This would be too small for an older child. It is toddler size. I love that the blanket is fleece and soft just like his larger cars blanket. Also i love that i can wash it all at one time. pillow is on the thinner side but it is fine for what we needed it for. his teacher only wanted a blanket and pillow that would fit in one bag. i was haveing trouble getting a regular pillow to fit with blanket in his backpack. This is perfect with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young toddler. Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 month old moving up into the toddler class- it is perfect for her!!! I would say if you are buying for OLDER than 2 years old- move up to a standard size sleep mat- this one is small. As far as quality- we were super pleased with this one. The blanket is super soft like all my babies other favorites. And we also washed it in the machine with no issues. GREAT MAT!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute toddler rolled nap map, however, it is very small for my toddler. He is 3 years old and when he lays on the mat, He is almost longer than the mat already. I am a little disappointed because I bought this for his daycare starting in Sept! I do find pillow in the right height, but it's now fluffy enough. It flattened after our first testing sleep night. Overall, I am a little disappointed. But I will keep it since I got it on sale. And It is very convenient for the daycare nap because it rolls up into a small roll!
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: Naptime could not be easier!!!
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved these. I have to buy two of most things since I have twin daughters. I bought these before the girls were even a year old and I still use these today and my girls are 3 years old now. They have lasted through hundreds of nap times and sleepovers. I have washed these over and over and their color have held up. They are super comfy and easily roll up for storage or travel. I would have bought them again if need be but I haven't had to since these are still working perfectly for them. Thank you so much for selling such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MommaInspired

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it to be used on her travel cot and it fits perfect. Its not super thick/padded except for the pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! This was exactly what I expected. I purchased it to be used on her travel cot and it fits perfect. Its not super thick/padded except for the pillow so it may need extra padding if used on a hard floor but it is perfect for what I need and my daughter is excited to start using it. She is 3 and half and the length and size is just right for her, im pretty sure she'll be able to still fit in it for at least another 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Super Short, and Zero Cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different nap mats to test them out, and this was one of the worst. Cons: -super thin and zero cushioning -no straps or weight to it to stop it from becoming a mess when the child moves - material feels cheap and fleece blanket is bound to get gross after multiple washes -Super short! This was way too short for my 4 year old. My 2 year old just fit, and would probably outgrow it, halfway through the school year. I returned this just as fast I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: gecko girl

customer_reviews.title: Weird design Velcro straps and carrying handle offset to the side
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased numerous nap mats that are similar to this style. What I did not like about this one, was that the straps to Velcro the nap mat is offset to the side. So when you roll it up, the straps and handle are off to one side of the mat vs. being in the middle. It’s a really bad design and makes no sense. I think they expect you to fold the mat in half lengthwise and then roll it up. But then the rolled up mat ends up being super thick and the straps are not long enough to Velcro it shut.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR DAY CARE
customer_reviews.text: WE BOUGHT THIS FOR OUR GRANDSON TO USE AT DAY CARE, THEY RECOMMENDED JUST A PLASTIC FOLD OUT MATT, AND HONESTLY, WHO WANTS THEIR CHILD SLEEPING ON A COLD PLASTIC MAT. THIS THING COMES WITH A PILLOW ATTACHED. IT ROLLS RIGHT UP AND HAS A CARRY HANDLE ON THE OUTSIDE, SO I JUST PICK UP MY GRANDSON, AND EASILY GRAB HIS MAT AND BACK PACK. HONESTLY, WE HAVEN'T WASHED IT BECAUSE I COULDN'T FIND A ZIPPER TO REMOVE THE PILLOW. I'M JUST WORRIED ABOUT ALL THE COTTON BUNCHING TO ONE SIDE AFTER A WASH. OTHER THEN THAT, WE LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: C. PAYTON

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre and too small for 4- and 5-year-olds
customer_reviews.text: Check the size before ordering. This is sized for a 2 or 3 year old, not a taller 4 or 5 year old....We also didn’t like the way it rolled up. You have to really squish it to get the Velcro to fasten. A younger child might have trouble doing that solo...You can only carry it by the hand using the small handle. There isn’t a strap to sling over your child’s shoulder, which is a feature we always used on my daughter’s previous nap mat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Semler

customer_reviews.title: Cute but lacking functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this item for my son! It was easy for me as well as it came with both pieces for his nap time. However, his teacher alerted me that because the bottom sheet part doesn’t have something to connect it to his cot it makes it difficult for him to get comfortable. This also makes the pillow part move around as well. I might try and see if I can sew an elastic piece to the bottom of it to attach it to his cot! But just a heads up for parents who’s kids might find it to distracting for nap time.
customer_reviews.author: Jauniyah

customer_reviews.title: Its fine for daycare where they place it on a mat
customer_reviews.text: This toddler sleeping mat is cute but much thinner than i thought it would be. Its fine for daycare where they place it on a mat. Otherwise theres not much padding and would not be comfortable on the bare floor
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this nap pad
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this nap pad. She used it for daycare every day and it stood up to weekly washings for 8 months before we saw a tiny tear. She loves it still and we use it at home. It's lightweight and the blanket on top is very soft and warm. The pad is soft, but not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Napmat for a Minnie Mouse fan
customer_reviews.text: My 23 month old loves Minnie Mouse so she was super excited to get this to take to preschool for naptime. I don't let her sleep inside it as the place is hot. She sleeps on the blanket instead of covering with it. The material is superb. Feels really good. Only downside of this napmat to my 3 year old son's Spiderman napmat is that the pillow cannot be remove before washing.
customer_reviews.author: Meeka

customer_reviews.title: Machine Washable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently started VPK and needed a nap mat. This one happened to be on sale and looked big enough. My favorite thing is that you can wash and dry it in the machine and no weird lumps happened to the pillow part. The blanket is nice that it's attached but the mat part is very thin. It is soft but doesn't provide any thickness to lay on. My daughter is almost 5 and a little over average height and this is almost too short for her.
customer_reviews.author: K. Alvers

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I saw several negative reviews, but there were many more that were good so I decided to try this mat....boy am I sorry that I didn't listen to the customers that were not happy! Some happy customers said that it was perfect for their 4 year old (the age of my grandson) but the size is better for a 2-3 year old and the "pillow" (I use that term loosely) is lumpy and poorly filled. The "mat" is not much more than a double layer of fabric with binding along the edge. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My three year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried because of other reviews. Purchased for my daughter for head start for nap time, it is on the thin side but my daughter loves it. It’s super comfortable to her and light weight and easy for her to carry. We’ve washed multiple times without any wearing or ripping or fading. She’s very happy with her Minnie set, happy daughter is a happy mommy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Made a very happy toddler
customer_reviews.text: I will be purchasing another as my son (3) loves this Toy Story napper! He was so excited when he opened it that he wanted to sleep on it right away. It's pillow is plush and comfy but it can be hard to fold. But that really isn't a complaint because it's so worth it! 3 washes in and it's as good as new...more than I can say for other nappers we've bought from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Hayli Watts

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after one wash
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this. My daughter's daycare had lost a blanket and my daughter never used the sheet I gave her to cover her mat. I thought this was a great way to ensure that she had what she needed and wasn't sleeping directly on the plastic mat. However, after washing it just one time (on delicate), holes appeared where the blanket is sewn to the trim. I'd say the idea is great but poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A. Pirog

customer_reviews.title: My little boy loves Mickey so this was perfect!! I send it with him to daycare ...
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves Mickey so this was perfect!! I send it with him to daycare and all the workers ask me where I go it because it is padding for him to lay on but also a blanket which is perfect. The only reason I took off a star was because when you roll it up there is only Velcro on one side which is kind of weird but not the end of the world of course.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Hood

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Minnie Mouse mat. It’s very convenient when she falls asleep on the living room floor and I don’t want to wake her by carrying her upstairs. It’s easy to throw in the washer when needing to clean. I do however wished the pillow was removable so that it would be quicker to dry but it’s not a huge drawback because the pillow is small and light. It’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Microbiologist Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love It For My Toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This nap mat came quickly in the mail, and it is very cute! It's the perfect size for a toddler and our little one fit perfectly in this with space for growing room. Our little one has already fell in love with it and it is perfect to lay in front of the TV to watch a favorite show, or to take a nap. This will come in handy, and I like the fact that it rolls up and has straps to keep it bundled when you put it away. Definitely a GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, very satisfied with the quality for the price. The blanket is a fleece material and the rest of it is that slippery polyester material, which is what I was expecting from others’ Pictures. The pad is very thin, I would not order this for use directly on the floor. Not a problem because it is used on top of a cot at my daughter’s daycare. Again, what I was expecting based off other reviews but be sure that is what you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and very pretty. It’s a little short to cover the feet for my 3 year old grandchild but it is loved. The only downside to this product is that the Velcro strap used to keep it rolled up for transport gets stuck on the blanket in the dryer and has caused snags to the blanket. I cut off the Velcro to avoid further damage as this is a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: AudreyR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THIS!!!! Got it for my sons birthday present and he now bring it to school for nap time. It is perfect size for him and the blanket attached is super soft and easy to wash. Also has a lebel inside you can fill out with your childs info! perfect for school for Pre -k or Kinder students! (Under age 5)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Complete rip off
customer_reviews.text: Its just a very thin flimsy blanket. I thought it was a sleeping mat that I could put on floor for kids to take a nap but theres not any padding so its the same as putting a sheet on the ground. Really pissed I wasted my $ on 2 of these. Second one hasn’t arrived yet & tempting to refuse delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but shorter than we thought.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice soft nap pads. The only issue we have is my daughter is kinda tall about 44-45 inches at 4 years old and her feet hang out of the bottom. They are nice otherwise and she likes playing in it anyway but we wanted to use it for travel naps too. Quality is good and they are cozy, just a bit small for our girl.
customer_reviews.author: Derek&Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to roll as designed
customer_reviews.text: Grandson likes it, and uses it at preschool; but I never roll it up as it was intended, because it requires an incredibly tight roll to make the velcro reach. I skip the final folding in half before rolling, and the handle ends up on one end instead of in the center. Grandson wants to carry it himself and drags it on the ground because of the handle not being centered.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daycare nap time. My 3 year old daughter loves it. We used a toddler sheet and toddler blanket for daycare before I bought this. With this we don't need to bring a sheet anymore. Much more convenient and it has a pillow attached to it. My daughter and I are very happy with this. So happy I found it.
customer_reviews.author: FallIsMyFav

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing twins at my sons school with something similar. My son LOVES IT during nap time and takes it to grandmas for nights over. Easy to wash, I wash it by itself and sometimes i let it air dry but it can also be thrown in the dryer if you're in a hurry (low heat). Color doesn't fade and it doesn't leave lent on his clothes (what I was afraid of ) and the pillow stays in tact after wash and dry. Had it for a few months now and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: dreeka

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fast delivery but small
customer_reviews.text: Cute concept but bit too small. My LO is a rollover and complaint that feet doesn’t get to cover since the blanket is not long enough. I defo would buy a bit bigger version as we’re planing on keeping this one for the playroom so teddy’s can take their naps since I couldn’t return it
customer_reviews.author: ALLY

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, portable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for daycare. He absolutely loves it. I had already purchased something similar and wanted another one in case this one didn't get cleaned right away. I recommend them for your little ones. So soft and inviting with the pillow attached so it is all in one single unit with a name tag and a handle to carry it with.
customer_reviews.author: RNiswonger780

customer_reviews.title: Great Nap Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size nap mat for daycare. I wash this every week when it’s sent home from daycare and it’s held up pretty nice, pillow has stayed fluffy. Blanket is super soft and big enough to nicely cover my toddler. My only complaint is it is a bit difficult to roll up nicely and strap. It arrived so nicely rolled up but I have not been able to roll it up that way!
customer_reviews.author: Daiana

customer_reviews.title: As expected, given the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. I’ve washed it maybe 5 times now and while the pillow has become a bit bunched up, everything else has held up well. Definitely long enough for my 14 month old son. Although it’s quite soft, I will say there is pretty much no padding in it (aside from the pillow), so if you’re looking for something really plush, keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who is 2 years old. She goes to a daycare 4 times a week this is a great addition to her daycare supplies it is really comfortable for her, its easy to fold and carry anywhere it is also really pretty colors of the sheets are as pictured
customer_reviews.author: michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Very Vibrant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1yr old to sleep on with his mat at daycare and he loves it! The staff says he sleeps very well on it. The blanket is plush and the little pillow is soft but cushioned. It cleans very well and I have no complaints about the quality after washing once a week. Overall, for the price and the quality I would recommend this item and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Of 3-Boys!

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for nappy time in  preschool
customer_reviews.text: My kid is 2 and school require to bring own bed sheet and blanket for nappy time. I bought this, it's not bad. But it's only fit for toddlers because the size is not that big for older kid. The blanket is fleece material, feel cheap ,but for a 13$ product, overall quality is OK, no complain or surprise...
customer_reviews.author: Tian

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up great after weekly washings!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always washed gentle cycle after reading other reviews, and fluffed the pillow before the dryer. This is perfect nap pad for 3-4 year old. Check height of your child if he’s tall—it’s a little short for a tall kindergartener. Someone else took home by mistake one weekend and returned it with the pillow completely flat after washing. I rewashed and fluffed it before dryer—it fluffed right back up. It has held up great with weekly washings.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last two months...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for pre‐k. Started in September, and we are only halfway into October and the pillow is already ripping away from the mat. It's only used for about 45 minute 5 days a week. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Our daycare raves about this one!
customer_reviews.text: Our daycare teachers love this one! We no longer need to bring in three items (sheet, pillow, blanket). And the whole thing just goes in the wash at the end of the week. We bought two because they're so convenient! Perfect size for a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: Toddler is a fan of it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and roll up. My toddler likes to take it to sleep overs at her grandparents. The pillow is thin and you need to fluff it after it's rolled up. Really, just place a real pillow over it when your toddler is sleeping. Fleece is thin but reasonable. Overall good to use ontop of a bed or cushion.
customer_reviews.author: bernut86

customer_reviews.title: Minnie bedroll
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed something for day care, and she loves Minnie Mouse so this was perfect. The blanket is a think piece of fleece but it works. I purchased it in August and seams are starting to come undone now but it might be because I throw it in the washer and dryer weekly. I will order it again when this one is no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsDeuse

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got it for daycare, and it seems to have no problems. Me careful not to wash with other blankets as the Velcro will catch. Besides that issue I would have given it 5 stars. Plus got it for 19 instead of the prices listed now.
customer_reviews.author: Toiesha D

customer_reviews.title: A very very happy camper
customer_reviews.text: My little one is in pre K and he absolutely loves Mickey Mouse. He was so excited to take his sleeping bag to school. He was a very very happy little camper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grear lil napper
customer_reviews.text: Read the measurements before you buy! This is, at best, usable until child is 3yrs old. I bought it to use for our wagon so this is perfect for my intended use. The napper is soft and blanket part is thick enough. It is also compact once folded. My son also likes to use it around the house. This is not thick enough to use directly on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ged

customer_reviews.title: Best Minnie nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Feels soft easy for child to carry. Easy fold has two Velcro strips to easily holding it closed. I recommend putting a blanket or some kind of padding underneath it. My kids loves it. Good buy as a gift for any child.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality, softness, and size.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this product. Initially, I thought this would be more of a sleeping bag with pillow attached, but the cushiony mat and pillow are just attached to a very soft blanket. The colors are vibrant. The width of the mat is double the folded size. I would get this again (and probably will when my daughter is old enough).
customer_reviews.author: AmyArmy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why there’s no review mention that this blanket is way too thin, and the pillow is way too soft for kiddos. I mean it’s super convenient, I’ll give that, but it’s not the quality I want for my baby. He loves Mickey Mouse and we already washed it, otherwise I’d totally return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! My 2 1/2 year old was super excited ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My 2 1/2 year old was super excited when I showed him. I wish it was a bit longer as I don’t think it will last more than a year unless he curls up. (My son is fairly tall.) I bought it to use as a nap mat at preschool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pre-k
customer_reviews.text: The product ripped after one was in the washer machine but it was replaced with no hassle. I will continue to buy as I do not want my toddler face on the nap mats and this all in one removes the pillow moving and therefore face on the mat. All in one as she naps at school.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute. Pop in washer every week!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nap mat. Be aware... Kid is simply sleeping on a heavy blanket and covered by a light blanket. My school still has a foam mat under her for more cushion. But that is for sleeping on floors. If your child is sleeping with this elswhere its super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his 2nd birthday I was a little nervous getting it since I had seen the review of how small it is , it is small but it’s perfect for my son he fits perfectly and he loves that it’s toy story since he’s a toy story fanatic ( he watches toy story every day) I feel like it would work for him at his babysitters house definitely Sending it out with him he will probably only use it for 8months more but totally ok with it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little nap mat for my 4 year old to bring to preschool! it is compact enough to fit in her cubby. It is the perfect size for her and she loves it. The blanket is thin but she does not need much and I like the little attached pillow. Definitely recommend for a preschool child and you can't go wrong with the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price if right for quality (lasts about 1 year)
customer_reviews.text: We had for one year (washing once a week) by the end of the year cotton was coming out and fabric was tearing. This was our first try for a nap mat and overall happy for the year. Wanted to try a different brand to see if we can get to last for longer than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lammons

customer_reviews.title: Works great for school
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and portable for my sons school. The pattern is his favorite and the quality is above average. The Velcro yo roll it up is not centered though which is a little awkward, but overall it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Oh58sabo

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen some review and saying that it wasn’t durable; However, I disagree. We’ve had this blanket for over a month now and we wash it once a week and I am yet to see a tear or refund is blank. I will definitely buy again and I will definitely recommend. Great product, an even way better price.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 and under
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping mat for my 3 year older. She loved it of course but it was too perfect for her. She petite and just turned 3. Probably wouldn't be a good fit for most 3 year olds. In a few months she would definitely out grow this mat. I returned it for one suitable for preschool. This would be better for a child 1-2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Arriola

customer_reviews.title: If you need a nap mat, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing for my son in kindergarten. It's very soft and looks just like how it does on Pictures. The pillow is very fluffy and comfortable and doesn't clump after washing. His teacher sends them home every Friday to be washed and I've probably washed it at least 6 times and has held up perfectly. I do wash and dry on delicate per instructions. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian m. Babb

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for camping for our toddler and loved it. Super soft and works great for at home as well. Easy to clean, the folding doesn’t always line up (still works), the “blanket” is so plushy and soft, and it’s a good size for your average 1-5 depending on height.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Campos

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than what it looks
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because it's just very thin. I purchased this nap mat for my son's cot for our vacation but it's really thin, even the pillow is a lot smaller and thinner than what I expected. It's a thin blanket over another thin blanket w a small thin pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great quality. I purchased this matter as a gift. My son has one and we love it. Highly recommended for children who attend daycare. Holds up well when washed.
customer_reviews.author: dakota seal

customer_reviews.title: Soft Colrful. Attached Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love attached blanket. Like a pocket for your child. Soft. Not thick. Child uses for naps at school. Convenient fold up. Not a camping sleeping bag..Serves short nap purpose..or on bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: We have been using it for about 2 months now and it is holding up pretty well its soft
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this nap map twice a week at daycare and we wash it every weekend. We have been using it for about 2 months now and it is holding up pretty well its soft, well built and not falling a part yet. However after the first wash the pillow got really bunched up and never went back to its normal shape. Otherwise he loves his nap mat. I like that he doesn't sleep directly on the cot at daycare so overall this product is worth it. I'm only taking away one star because of the pillow becoming deformed after one wash.
customer_reviews.author: BreeGC2C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pre-K
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this nap mat. It's just perfect for my daughter at prek. She has a mat, blanket, and pillow all in one convenient bundle. It fits nicely in her cubby at school. And washed fairly well. I just had to sticky roll it once to remove some fuzzies but not too bad. The pillow held up well in the washer. I love how it rolls up nicely with Velcro straps to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Brisky

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these my child used for daycare and I was once a week we have one for over a year and still in great condition and colors are still as vibrant as the day I purchased it! Best part is it’s all in one pillow and blanket all in one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter said I couldn't have bought him a better gift.
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter had the hardest time getting my 1 to grandson to nap in his pack and play. I got this for him and she said he wont take a nap on or in anything else. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: As shown
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for xmas. Was imoressed with the packaging. I'm not going to open it and unravel it. But it looks 100% like what I expected. He loves mickey so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Preschool Needs
customer_reviews.text: Nap mat is shorter & thinner then the 1st nap mat (different brand) we purchased from Amazon. Yet $15 cheaper. Son loves the character, so we use it as a back up nap mat when I alternate them through the laundry. It washes well and has not faded after 3times
customer_reviews.author: Courtgriffi

customer_reviews.title: Cute sleeping mat
customer_reviews.text: My son recently started daycare and they requested a sleeping mat. This was very cute and my son loved it. I would have given this 5 stars but the bottom portion has no mat support. He was sleeping practically directly on the floor with no cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nap time at school
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wash. Perfect for nap time! Make sure you remember how you unrolled it to roll it back up properly. Roll it back up nice and tight in order to close it shut nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok nap mat for a baby- very small.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute nap mat, was very soft, but also very thin and short. My 3 year old's feet hung off the end of it. And you'd have to have a pad under it for it to be comfortable because it's so thin.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfortable! I brought it for daycare but she loves to use it at home to haha! The material feels great, not cheap at all! I hand washed it initially and let it air dry
customer_reviews.author: mommy10

customer_reviews.title: Almost a sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: It's sort of a napping system, not a very thick blanket, and not much padding underneath (just more fleece blanket), but it works well. Very convenient to have the pillow attached to the blanket, when your 3 year old has a habit of tossing his pillows. We used this as a daycare napping implement, and it works great for that. Oh and he loves Mickey, so that gets it at least one more star.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty American

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product serves its purpose i guess but it is very thin and the velcro scraps are placed in a very weird position. Update: total let down. I washed the nap mat in the washer it has ripped half way down the seam. the little liner as come off and this would take a sewing machine to fix. so disappointed and a complete waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: antonio Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nap mat!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this sleep mat! He takes it to daycare with him and it is the perfect size for his cot. I wash it once a week and so far it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Arrived quickly Affordable Soft Easy to clean Dislike: The pillow/nap is folded in half to roll which puts a crease in the already thin pillow The stitching on the pillow came out within a couple of washes (we never put in the dryer) The velcro wore very easily
customer_reviews.author: Travis Villareal

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be of good quality especially for the price (~$20) compared to other nap mats. It is smaller than I expected based on a Lambs and Ivy one I have for my older son. This one will work fine for my 1.5 year old but it won't fit him until kindergarten like the one I purchased for my older son will. I wish the straps for rolling it up were sewn onto the blanket rather than being a seperate piece.
customer_reviews.author: Partyof5

customer_reviews.title: Very flat sleep mat for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, so she could take it to daycare for nap time. It was a big too small for her, she has long legs and the pillow was very flat.
customer_reviews.author: QueenNesha

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Washed the set already and stayed the same. My 2 year old grandson loves it! He’s into lightning McQueen right now. He has the car, Backpack, sneakers with light, beddings, t-shirts you name it. He kept telling me “tinkyuuu”!
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Nap Mat
customer_reviews.text: Rolls up for easy storage and travel, very soft with a great lil pillow and soft blanket that overlaps the side for full coverage. My son uses it at daycare. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Joy E. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cute blanket, wrong skin tone
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves hers. But Moana is definitely way darker on the blanket than in the movie. So I’m not sure who messed that up. Either way, works as a great toddler nap time blanket & pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Breeze Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daycare! My baby doesnt touch their mat!! Cute little surprisingly fluffy pillow. Rolls up well and has a handle for my little lady to carry with ease. Super soft and very sustainable after many washes. Good quality and even has a name tag!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Loughlin Roman

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old for nap time at preschool. It is great and she loves it. Easy to fold up and bring home at the end of the week. Throw it in the machine to wash. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Daycare Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 year old for daycare. It’s a lot more convenient than taking a sheet, pillow and blanket. It’s also easy to wash, which is a huge plus! My son loves it! I would say any child over 3 would be too tall for this but it’s perfect for us right now! The price is also amazing compared to others I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Beranek

customer_reviews.title: The children like the Disney characters.I
customer_reviews.text: I donated this nap mat to a christian organization that has a daycare for children whose parents can't pay for a regular daycare. I will probably buy some more. I hope others will do the same.
customer_reviews.author: ermajo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my girl. Her teacher in day care told me it was super easy to fold and open. It’s convenient in school because it has cover, cushion and pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Huixin pan

customer_reviews.title: Pillow not full, mat not so thick
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My 2 yr old loooves it. I rated 4 because the pillow is not full and the mat is not so thick. I expected this though. I really bought this for our camping trip. She gets so hot that I cannot get her the regular sleeping bag that are closed off so this works for her. This is very ideal during nap time around the house or daycare. I haven't washed it so I'm not sure what will happen after that. These came in sealed.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Thin padding but soft.
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I was hoping for. The cushion of the bed itself is pretty thin. Machine washable but the pillow gets a little messed up in the wash. Otherwise my soon like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

product_meta.title: Disney Minnie Mouse Toddler Rolled Nap Mat, Sweet as Minnie, Minnie Mouse - Sweet as Minnie
product_meta.description: Color:Minnie Mouse - Sweet as MinnieSweet as Minnie toddler rolled nap mat-quilted mat, blanket and pillow all-in-one. Features Minnie adorned in her classic pink and white polkadot bow and pink pumps. Comes with a carry strap that makes it easy to transport to preschool and overnight stays. Machine washable.
feature_bullets: Comes with an easy carry strap, perfect for travel
Blanket finished size: 30" x 33", mat finished size (including pillow): 20" x 44"
Machine wash separately in cold water, gentle cycle, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry on low heat, do not iron, do not dry clean
Comes with an easy carry strap, perfect for travel
Blanket finished size: 30" x 33", mat finished size (including pillow): 20" x 44"
Machine wash separately in cold water, gentle cycle, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry on low heat, do not iron, do not dry clean
100% polyester microfiber. Textile construction: Plain weave
